page.title: 16EWELL VILLAGE
page.content:
The village of Ewell has many interesting buildings.Three of these buildings can be found in Church Street.These buildings are:_The old 'Watch House',Ewell Castle and the parish church. {The Parish Church of St. Mary} was completed in 1848.The tower of the previous 15th century church still exists. {Ewell Castle}was built in 1814 by a man called Thomas Calverly.It is the largest house in Ewell and is now a boys' school. {The old 'Watch House'}used to be used as a village 'lock up' and also to house the old fire engine.
continued on page 17
